name: Snowmen attack (itch)
description:
Snowmen Attack (no sound)
Control with the mouse.
Melt them before their increasing number snowballs you.
You win when they are all melted, if you can do that before your framerate melts.
Each snowman reduces your shot cooldown.
C: turn autofire on/off
     Left Mouse Button or Space or X: manual fire (not recommended)

CLICK TO START
